item.title: Is this the right Jack Irvine?
item.description: First thing’s first, introductions My name is Jack, I’m currently a third-year undergraduate studying Artificial Intelligence at The University of Edinburgh. If you’re looking for the former public relations manager for Rangers, or the talented Australian artist behind the album artwork of the Skegss, I’m afraid you’re in the wrong place. Otherwise, hello and welcome to my personal website. Originally from Shetland, I’ve been fortunate to have had opportunities to travel all around the world, including a year in China where I received a scholarship to study Mandarin Chinese for 11 months.
